name: DUNGEON16K for NEXT
description:
This game is a direct port of "Dungeon 16K", using the same assembly code with the help of the NextLibs library and NextBuild (by David Saphier) in order to use the ZX Spectrum Next mode for texts and sounds.

Code, music and SFX: Mr Rancio

Graphics and "loading screen": F3M0

Testing: Volatil

Special Thanks to Greenweb Sevilla.

Tools: Vortex Tracker,  zx.remysharp.com 

Explore the dungeon to find a hidden loot in the dragon´s lair. 

Yo must find the key in the bottom of the map to open the door in the top of the map. This door leads to the dragon.

KEYBOARD

QAOP

SPACE-FIRE

M- BOMB

R-QUIT
